- Make app to download YouTube videos to phone and watch/listen offline
- Make app to guess the name of the movie based on a picture (similar to Shazam with music)
- Make an app that has street walking navigation 
- Use smartphone to get live video like as a spy cam without having to buy separate equipment
- Make app for editing PowerPoint, Word, and Excel in one place and from numerous cloud storages
- Make an app that will allow you to use GPS offline and doesn't take too much storage
- Build an AI that can determine what notes are played on a midi keyboard on youtube videos and automatically generate a PDF with the sheet music
- Build a website that will automatically trim multiple sections of a video
- Create some software that can users from screenshooting or taking pictures of a confidential document
- Build an app that will automatically download and sync all or selected google photos photos to a local hard disk
